post.title: New Disclaimer
post.content: Observant readers who view my site in HTML rather than just reading the RSS feed may have noticed I’ve added a disclaimer to my site. What a coincidence, it’s very similar to the disclaimer other Microsoft employees use when they post on newsgroups.
